text: Shan Sharif Khan (born 18 December in Pollachi, Tamil Nadu) is an Indian film actor. == Early life == Shan Sharif khan is from Pollachi(Coimbatore Dt), Tamil Nadu, India. == Career details == Shan entered into Tamil film industry through Meendum Oru Kadhal Kadhai, a Tamil musical-romance film directed by Mithran Jawahar and released in August 2016. He played the role of Isha Talwar's lover in that film. He continued his career by playing small roles in Thangamagan and Ko 2. His next film was Dora, in which he played a lead villain role named Pavan Sharma opposite to Nayanthara that gave him a breakthrough in his film career. This role gave many new film chances for Shan. His next project is a bilingual movie in Tamil and Hindi directed by Sajo Sundar in which Shan is playing a Police role. == Filmography == *All films are in Tamil, unless otherwise noted. {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Key | style="background:#FFFFCC;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Film !Role !class=unsortable|Notes |- | 2015 || Thangamagan |Varun || |- |rowspan="2"| 2016 || Meendum Oru Kadhal Kadhai || Imran || |- | Ko 2 || Kishore || |- | 2017 || Dora || Pavan Sharma || |- | 2017 ||Paambhu Sattai|| || |- |rowspan="2" |2018 || X Videos || Imran Khan || |- |Kaala|| Shan || |- | 2020 ||Ayalaan|| || |} ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Tamil male actors
title: Shan (actor)
